Source code for model.observers.logger

import sys

from model.observers.observer import Observer, Observable



[docs]class Logger(Observer):
	LOG_LEVEL = 2


[docs]	def update(self, observable, notification_type, **kwargs):
		if notification_type == Observable.LOG and Logger.LOG_LEVEL > 1:
			print('LOG:', kwargs["message"])
		elif notification_type == Observable.EXECUTED and Logger.LOG_LEVEL > 2:
			print('LOG: Executed exchange')
		elif notification_type == Observable.REMOVED and Logger.LOG_LEVEL > 2:
			print('LOG: Removed {0} exchange(s)'.format(len(kwargs["removed"])))
		elif notification_type == Observable.FINISHED_ROUND and Logger.LOG_LEVEL > 1:

			sys.stdout.write(
				'\rLOG: Finished round {0} with {1} exchanges'.format(kwargs["iteration"], len(kwargs["realized"])))
		elif notification_type == Observable.CLOSE and Logger.LOG_LEVEL > 1:
			sys.stdout.write("\n")
